modName: KYS - One Does Not Simply Die Alone
summary: When you losing a fight and is about to get killed but wanted drag your enemies along to your end..
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=6][color=#ff7700][u]MADE-UP LORE[/u][/color][/size][/b][/center][center][size=2][b][color=#ff7700]There's once a infamous student from the College of Winterhold, who have failed the final test for Novice curriculum in multiple occasion
Unable to pass such degree aside for getting fed up with pressure & shame[/color][/b][color=#ff7700]Poor soul' have just resided to seclusion while experimenting with Alchemy, trying to create something new just to impress bullying colleges
But only created own demise upon taking the potion for it's effectiveness.
[/color][/size][/center][center][/center][center][color=#ff7700]Years gone passed, a hermit strayed to the resting place of undergraduate student's work place
Having low on sleeping tree sap while witnessing the Alchemy table[/color]
[color=#ff7700]Lonely soul' did meddle with the failure that has been left
Similar faith in the exact same spot where the deceased student felt last moment of life.[/color][/center][center][color=#ff7700]
Generation later, a insolent Instructor resorted into hiding after a unforgivable altercation in the college for being denied to be the new Archmage
Realizing didn't bring any vital tools and equipment for a grand comeback
Foolish soul' just decided to improvise what's very little available on the tunnels
Specialized with destruction scrolls, mixing what's very left to the Alchemy table only produce own unforeseen demise.[/color]
[/center][center][color=#ff7700]For some *[i][size=1]insert time period here[/size][/i]* a treasure scavenger fortuitously stumble upon a pile of unlabeled bottles and scrolls laying dormant on the floor
Decided to take it with him for a fortunate good trade [size=4][b](bucket on [u]Windhelm Warehouse[/u])
[/b][/size]Only revealing to the world how dangerous it really was and now being pursuit by the law for unknown dreaded goods
Ending up being the most wanted, only be returned to the very place where the wretched goods had been found [b][size=4](sack on [u]The Midden Dark[/u])
[/size][/b]No other choice but spend the rest of his remaining nights hiding & silently quell at the corners of stagnant shadows.[/color][/center][center][b][u][size=2]








[/size][size=6]INTENTION & DESCRIPTION OF THE MOD[/size][/u][/b][/center][center][/center][center]I have a habit to spam KillAll command whenever i my PC suddenly getting gang up and being killed for some noobish reasons..
[s](Mudcrabs, horde of Vampire and mutts, Falmers and bugs)
[/s]Which lead me with this and making myself feel better seeing my PC not getting killed alone.
[color=#ffff00]This MOD adds 2 Potions and 1 Scroll
[/color]1. [color=#00ff00][b]KYS_RigorMortis[/b][/color] [consuming it will cast Blizzard for 10secs, will take fire damage and later inflicts fire AOE (no visual)]
2. [color=#00ff00][b]KYS_Breeze[/b][/color] [using this you will take fire damage but later inflicts fire AOE (no visual)]
3. [color=#00ff00][b]KYS_SpontaneousHumanCombustion[/b][/color] [casting this will release a fire storm spell, receive Health damage and a flame cloak for 10secs]
[color=#ffff00]THE LOCATION OF WHERE YOU CAN FIND THE Potions & Scroll WAS CAN BE SEEN TO THE Image SECTION
[size=3]THE SEQUENCE IS STARTING FROM Top TO Bottom[/size]
[/color]A single of this on inventory is enough for upon death you will be playing back to your very last save game with exact inventory items.









[b][b][color=#000000][size=6][u]CONFLICTS[/u][/size][/color][/b][/b][/center][b][b][center][color=#000000]Anything that changes the place or adding things where the Bucket and Small Sack of this MOD was located.
Mods/tools like [b][b](ReProccer)[/b][/b] that changes/adjusting other mods to match up any overhaul to specific mods.
[/color]


[/center][/b][/b][center][b][b][size=6][i][color=#ff0000]----------[/color][/i][/size][/b][i][color=#ff0000][size=6]-------[/size][/color][/i][/b][size=6][color=#ff0000][b]--------[/b][b]POSSIBLY F.A.Q.[/b][/color][i][b][color=#ff0000]----------[/color][/b][b][color=#ff0000]------[/color][b][color=#ff0000]----------
[/color][/b][/b][/i][/size][b][size=5][color=#00ffff]Is this somewhat inspired of "Allahu Akbar"?[/color][/size][/b][/center][center][color=#00ffff][i]=No, NO IT's NOT!!!

[/i][/color][b][color=#00ffff][size=5]Is this craftable?[/size][/color][/b][/center][center][color=#00ffff][i]=NO, Because of the Made-Up Lore

[/i][b][size=5]How can i get more of this???
[/size][/b][i]=Use "AddItemMenu - Ultimate Mod Explorer"
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?

[/i][b][size=5]I can't find the items where it's supposed to be!
[/size][/b][i]=Make sure you have activated the Esp to your Skyrim's Game Launcher (Data Files) or ModManager

[/i][b][size=5]What the heck is KYS????
[/size][/b][i]=Killing your self

[/i][b][size=5]What's with the silly LORE?
[/size][/b][i]=IT's A PRODUCT OF SLEEP DEPRIVATION AND A GREAT EXAMPLE [/i][i]YOU SHOULD NEVER DO THE SAME AS I DID[/i][i]!

[/i][/color][b][color=#00ffff][size=5]What's up [/size][/color][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=5]with[/size][/color][/b][b][color=#00ffff][size=5] [/size][/color][size=5]Leonardo Dicaprio[/size][color=#00ffff][size=5]?[/size][/color][/b][/center][center][color=#00ffff][i]=Cheers! Seeing your enemies perish as well :)

[/i][b][size=5]This mod is not for me.
[/size][/b][/color][i][color=#00ffff]=Wise decision :)

[/color][/i][b][size=5][color=#00ffff]Your English sucks.[/color]
[/size][/b][i][color=#00ffff][size=2]=I KNOW :D
[/size][/color][/i][b][color=#ff0000][size=6][b]----------[/b][b]----------[/b][b]----------[/b][b]----------[/b][b]----------[/b][b]----------[/b][b]----------[/b][/size][/color][/b][/center]
author: baddong
